comment:
>>37762700
>If we make friendly with the other party and none of them can identify our pickaxe we might want to just head back for now
There's nothing keeping us from using an unidentified weapon/tool, seeing as our starting equipment was unidentified too.

Depending on how the game handles identification, this could either mean that we don't gain the benefits of whatever enchantments/quality the weapon has until identified, or it gives us those benefits/detriments silently and we just can't see what they are at a glance without IDing it.
name: Anonymous
